com.squareup.picasso

Class UrlConnectionDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.UrlConnectionDownloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Downloader

    public class UrlConnectionDownloader
extends Object
implements Downloader
    A Downloader which uses HttpURLConnection to download images. A disk cache of 2% of the total available space will be used (capped at 50MB) will automatically be installed in the application's cache directory, when available.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.squareup.picasso.Downloader

        Downloader.Response, Downloader.ResponseException

      • load

        public Downloader.Response load(android.net.Uri uri,
                                int networkPolicy)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Downloader
        Download the specified image url from the internet.
        Specified by:
        load in interface Downloader
        Parameters:
        uri - Remote image URL.
        networkPolicy - The NetworkPolicy used for this request.
        Returns:
        Downloader.Response containing either a Bitmap representation of the request or an InputStream for the image data. null can be returned to indicate a problem loading the bitmap.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the requested URL cannot successfully be loaded.

        Description copied from interface: Downloader
        Allows to perform a clean up for this Downloader including closing the disk cache and other resources.
